articles.title: 'Scored 400 runs. Best No. 3 batter of season': Sehwag praises uncapped Indian - Hindustan Times
articles.description: If the veterans received a second wind in IPL 2022, the youngsters and uncapped players weren't far behind. In fact, former India opener Virender Sehwag has lavished praise on a 31-year-old batter, whom he feels was the most successful No. 3 batter of the sea…
articles.content: Once again, the IPL left behind a plethora of stars. From uncapped Indians to veteran cricketers, all left behind an impression in the IPL 2022. Jos Buttler obviously led the run charts with over 800… [+1673 chars]

articles.title: Four observations from Germany’s 1-1 draw with England in the UEFA Nations League - Bavarian Football Works
articles.description: Germany got robbed by UEFA officials and England escaped with a draw in a game where they were thoroughly out classed. Here are the observations from this match.
